attributes.action: Scotland demands Devo Max (Full Fiscal Automomy)
attributes.additional_details:
In September 2014, Scotland voted to remain within the union after voting in the Referendum. The people have had no say in the " powers" that Westminster promised to hand over.
We, the people of Scotland, demand Devo Max to obtain full fiscal autonomy where the Scottish Parliament would receive all tax levied in Scottish land and waters. The Scottish Parliament would be responsible for most of the spending in Scotland but would make payments to the UK government to cover Scotland's share of UK-wide services to include defence and foreign relations.

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: Full UK Devolution Settlement

Created by: Steven Petrie

Closing: 30/03/2015
